summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Bridge Rehabilitation and Replacement project; amending Ordinance 123417 to authorize the Director of the Department of Transportation to accept, on behalf of the City of Seattle, a Hydrant Easement from SPO, LLC, a Washington limited liability company in a portion of Block 30 of Ladd's First Addition to South Seattle for the purposes of construction, reconstruction, alteration, operation, maintenance, and repair of the water service facilities in connection with the Airport Way South Viaduct Over Argo Railroad Yard project.
